dc:title: Notes By the Way
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tells of the work and people at numerous Catholic Worker houses and farms on a journey through New York, Michigan, Ohio, and Pennsylvania.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 224 1945-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
